categories: Multi-player;PvP;Shared/Split Screen PvP;Shared/Split Screen;Full controller support;Keyboard Only Option;Remote Play Together;Family Sharing
description: Ropeat is a fun top-down shooter in which 2-10 players use their robots’ repeat-mechanic to win: Each player gets copies that repeat exactly what they did a few seconds ago. Plan carefully ahead or just dive into the chaos and win against your friends!

name: Rochinko
categories: Single-player;Family Sharing
description: Rochinko is a dark fantasy pachinko-roguelike where you launch arcane orbs into boards swarming with monsters and treasure, watching them ricochet through pegs in a cascade of destruction and gold. Upgrade your gear, master unique ball powers, and survive through 100 levels to save the Shadowlands.

description: Survive alone in your home. By day, gather resources from various locations, each trip costs time, so plan wisely. By night, repair your house and defend it against zombie hordes. Every decision counts in this fight for survival.
